Name: Tequila Mockingbird
Ingredients: 15 ml Giffard Peppermint Pastille crème de menthe
10 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Garnish with mint leaf floated on the cocktail or pegged to the rim.
History: Named after Harper Lee's 1960 novel To Kill a Mockingbird , this is thought to have been created sometime in the 1960s.
Nutrition: One serving of Tequila Mockingbird contains 207 calories
